name: Asociación Española de Reutilización Sostenible del Agua
membership: We are Affiliated Member of the American WateReuse Association.
goal:
The main objectives of the Association are:
1. Promote the efficient use of water resources by incorporating water reclamation and reuse strategies, on behalf of a sustainable environment.
2. Develop, promote the development and distribute among potential users the scientific knowledge and the technological means necessaries for an efficient water use.
3. Promote institutional collaboration as to foster efficient technological developments in the field of water reclamation and reuse.
